message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $120. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to the right person. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $110. That's a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
